title: Star Wars Knight Of The Old Republic 2 (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here kotor 2. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.

----------------


It is a perilous time for the galaxy. A brutal civil war has all but destroyed the Jedi Order, leaving the ailing Republic on the verge of collapse.

Five years after the events of Star WarsÃ¢â€žÂ¢ Knights of the Old RepublicÃ¢â€žÂ¢, in a time when the Jedi have been brought to the edge of extinction, a former Jedi Knight exiled from the Jedi Order embarks on a tribulous journey to restore their connection to the ForceÃ¢â€žÂ¢. You must make the choices that turn The Exile to either the light side or the dark side of the ForceÃ¢â€žÂ¢, and travel to six planets picking up additions to your party along the way, to either help or hinder the Republic's 
efforts to bring peace and stability to the galaxy.

Star WarsÃ¢â€žÂ¢ Knights of the Old RepublicÃ¢â€žÂ¢ II: The Sith LordsÃ¢â€žÂ¢ is a sequal to the blockbuster RPG Star Wars Knights of the Old Republic. Players continue to enjoy the title's emotionally compelling and story-driven theme, additions to features such as new characters, classes, locations and force powers as well as a deeper look into the founding lore.


Follow up to the acclaimed and original Star Wars Knights of the Old Republic.

Choose from three different classes of Jedi, each with access to specific Jedi abilities.

Choose the light or the dark side of the Force as you progress through the story.

The choices you make will affect your character, those in your party and those who may join you in your quest.
